purpose: The email announces the call for papers (CFP) for the 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025) to be held in Lyon, France from December 2-5, 2025. It invites researchers, engineers, and practitioners to submit high-quality research and case studies on various topics related to software-defined systems. The email provides details on submission deadlines, guidelines, and areas of interest for contributions, emphasizing the importance of interdisciplinary dialogue and collaboration in shaping the future of software-controlled systems.

infos:
Subject: CFP: (IEEE Tech Sponsored) SDS2025: Lyon, France 2-5 Dec 2025 - The 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Wed, 25 Jun 2025 16:18:03 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
*The 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025)*

from hardware to software, SDS 2025 aims to stimulate cross-disciplinary

and solution is intelligently controlled by software.
Accepted papers will be published in the conference
papers will appear in the SDS 2025 Proceeding and to be submitted to IEEE
